remarks: Corollary of ~ deg1mul2 : the univariate polynomials over a domain are a domain.  This is true for multivariate but with a much more complicated proof.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
ply1domn.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
ply1domn $p |- ( R e. Domn -> P e. Domn ) $.
